message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a great price considering its value to you, and it allows me to earn a fair return. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this price reflects both the value of the product to me and a fair return for you. I look forward to your response.
